award_title: Transforming Pockets of Innovation into Institutional Structures for Learning
subject: Reducing friction for sharing what already works
body:
Hi David,

Your work on scaling Learning Assistants and the Pedagogy Academy across departments involves a lot of moving pieces—training materials, data tracking, resources that need to be accessible to faculty across different units.

Ouro helps researchers share computational tools and datasets in a way that's actually usable and durable, rather than a zip file buried in supplementary materials. It could give you a single place to house the scripts, surveys, and documentation your team is already producing, without the usual back-and-forth of emailing files or digging through old folders.

I can set up access for your lab if you want to take a glance.

Hope you get some rest over winter break—happy holidays.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
